image_prompt: Madhubani-style figures with intricate floral borders, depicting a vibrant sun and a flawlessly bright moon, both as anthropomorphic figures.  The sun is depicted with angry features and a raised hand, while the moon is serene. Background shows a lush green landscape with stylized trees in the Madhubani style.  Sun's rays are depicted in bright orange and yellow, while the moon is a perfect white circle.
audio_text: చంద్రుడు అంతకాంతివంతంగా ఉన్నాడు, పగలు రాత్రి ఒకటే అయ్యాయి అని అన్నారు.

image_prompt: Warli tribal art with white-on-red motifs, showing the sun throwing dark ash at the moon. The moon is now partially obscured by dark spots, depicted in black.  Simple Warli style figures of birds and animals are in the background, illustrating the disruption of the natural world.
audio_text: సూర్యుడు కోపంతో బూడిద చల్లాడు, చంద్రుని మీద మచ్చలు పడ్డాయి.

image_prompt: Pattachitra style painting, showing a saddened moon hiding behind dark clouds.  The colors are muted blues and greys, reflecting the moon's sadness.  The clouds are depicted in swirling patterns, characteristic of Pattachitra.  A small village is shown in the distance, shrouded in darkness.
audio_text: చంద్రుడు బాధతో చీకటిలో దాక్కున్నాడు, ప్రజలు ఆందోళన చెందారు.

image_prompt: Madhubani art, depicting a young girl with dark hair and simple clothing, hands clasped in prayer, looking up at the dark sky.  The background has simple Madhubani style flowers and plants.  The girl's expression is one of hope and concern.
audio_text: చిన్నారి ఆ చంద్రుణ్ణి ప్రార్థించింది, దయచేసి తిరిగిరా అని.

image_prompt: Warli art, showing farmers struggling to harvest crops in the dark, with exaggerated features and simple lines.  The scene is dominated by dark colors, highlighting the difficulty.  The moon is partially visible, still showing its dark spots.
audio_text: రైతులు పంటలు కోయలేక ఇబ్బంది పడ్డారు, చీకట్లో.

image_prompt: Pattachitra style, showing the moon returning to the sky, its spots still visible but now radiating a gentle, softer light.  The colors are warmer now, with yellows and oranges.  Villagers are shown rejoicing, their figures depicted in the characteristic Pattachitra style.
audio_text: చంద్రుడు తిరిగి వచ్చాడు, అతని మచ్చలతో సహా.

image_prompt: A blend of Madhubani and Warli styles, showing the moon gently illuminating the earth. The moon is depicted with its spots, but surrounded by stars and radiating a warm, comforting glow.  The scene shows a peaceful night landscape with stylized trees and animals.
audio_text: అతని కాంతి ప్రపంచాన్ని వెలిగించింది, అందరినీ ఆనందపరిచింది.
